titleStmt.title: Heaven and earth, sea and dry land, hear the word of the Lord, sounded through an earthen vessel, who hath seen, heard, felt as he doth declare [by] John Suinton.
titleStmt.author: Swinton, John, 1621?-1679.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
